title: Black Friday E2 - Evil Cubed
description:
With the store plunged into darkness, Bob and Tanya try to follow emergency protocols, but a trio of Hell Demons have other plans. 

For more shows like this, visit Realm.fm, and sign up for our newsletter while you're there!

Fear: Black Friday is a Realm production. Listen away.
